features: 【NO MORE BENDING!】Upgrade broom with dustpan combo set. Measures Over 55"overall tall by 10" width, Lobby Broom steel handle is 52" long, Dust Pan steel handle is 38.5" long offer stand up cleaning
【SAVE SPACE】Heavy duty broom and dustpan set snaps together for easy stand-up storage rely on wall, save your space. Great for cleaning office, dormitory,garage, hardwood floors, tiles etc.

【EASY SWEEP】Lobby dust pan and broom is perfect for all on-the-move applications for sweeping up and carrying debris and garbage. Built in scraper and comb/Teeth for easy to Clean broom into dustpan , clean pet hair and human hair with one pull on the teeth

【CLEANING HAPPINESS】Dustpan locks in open position to easily dispose of contents in the garbage can without spilling. The rubber lip in front of dust pan is flush with the floor,Make dustpan hugs the floor so one does not have to brush and brush to get the dirt in the pan,All debris and garbage goes into upright Dustpan Easily

【GRAREND'S MISSION】Make your houseword easier. (BE AWARE !! If Any concern you have, Please Contact us "Ask a Question" with your order ID). We are here for support and advice! And we'll bring a smile back to your face

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DOES THE HEIGHT OF THE BROOM MAKE YOU FEEL DEPRESSED? OUR GRAREND BROOM AND DUSTPAN SET CAN SOLVE YOUR TROUBLES.

Whether you be troubled by tiny dust or little paper that is not obedient and does not into the pan? Or when broom is dirty or full of hair, you don't want to clean it by hands, What should you do? Dustpan Teeth The broom with dustpan combo set builts in comb teeth for easy to scrape off the hair and rubbish of the broom silk into dustpan, easy to clean human hair/pet hair and dust on the broom. 4 Layers Thick Bristles Our broom and dustpan set comes with unique 4 layers of high quality bristles, which cleans the floor more efficiently, and it does not hurt the wooden floor and is suitable for various surface. Upgrade Rubber Lip Design Designed with micro curve on the dust pan, and the mouth of the dustpan adopts the TPR soft rubber lip, and it is flush for floor, so dust is never swept underneath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Broom Ever!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to do quick pick ups of cat litter except now I'm using it more than I am vacuuming. It gets in all the corners and underneath beds and dressers and any place the vacuum cannot go. The only thingI'm vacuuming now are rugs. It also seems to keep the floors cleaner for longer. I think the vacuum just scatters the litter around. Would have never thought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps me easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Love using my broom& dustpan don't have to bend down just sweep trash in tall dust pan..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The poles are a bit cheap thin metal. The bristles are plastic and a bit flimsy to sweep up. They need to be stiff.Overall will work ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The broom is easy to assemble, however, the bristles are too soft and needs to be sturdier. It's difficult to sweep up almost anything due to the bristles being too springy and bendable. Not a broom that I'd keep long term but for something to get you by for a little time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a pet household
reviews.reviewText: I love the tines on the dustpan that clean cat hair off the broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy. Love the dustpan that you can use to get hair off the broom.
reviews.reviewText: A great combination. Just need to keep using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I really wanted to like this broom. It’s compact. Easy to put together. Stands on its own. But every time I go to sweep dirt into the bin it misses 40% of the dirt that was supposed to go in. I don’t know if mine is deformed in someway. But. Honestly. Getting a new broom today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love the dustpan teeth feature for easy cleaning
reviews.reviewText: This is a great set of dust pan and broom that allows me to sweep and clean the garage floors without having to bend down or scoop over garbage. The dustpan opening is flushed to the floor and has long handle to hold while using the long broom to sweep things inside the dustpan. My favorite part is the dustpan teeth where I can easily shake off things off the bristle that are hard to get off such as feather and hairs due to static. Like many other similar dustpan and broom set, it can stand upright with the dustpan opening upwards so that dust and garbage stay inside with the broom locked to the dustpan handle for easy storage. Highly recommend it!
